message: We're experiencing an outage. Please check back later.
title: System Outage Notification
content:
Dear Valued Users,

We want to inform you that our system is currently experiencing an outage. Our team is aware of the issue and is actively working to resolve it as quickly as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

What Happened: We encountered unexpected technical difficulties that have impacted our services. We are taking immediate steps to rectify the situation.

Estimated Resolution Time: At this time, we cannot provide an exact timeline for when the services will be restored. We are committed to keeping you updated as more information becomes available.

What You Can Do: Please check our official communication channels for updates. You can also reach out to our support team if you have any urgent questions or concerns.

Thank you for your understanding and patience during this time. We value your support and will do our best to resolve this issue promptly.

Best regards,
Your Web App Team
